ISSUE.TITLE: Forked queries cannot be scheduled to recur
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As described here: https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/2426#issuecomment-454827177 This is due to forked queries having a `None` value for `schedule` but the UI expects the schedule format to be like ``` { 'interval': ..., 'until': ..., 'day_of_week': ..., 'time': ... } ```
